articles.description: Follow live text updates as Jamaica face Brazil and Panama play France in the Group F deciders at the 2023 Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up to Jamaica v Brazil & Panama v France

articles.description: Jamaica qualify for the knockout stages of the Women's World Cup for the first time as Brazil crash out early.
articles.title: Jamaica earn last-16 debut as Brazil and Marta go out

articles.description: Finn Russell will captain Scotland for the first time against France at Murrayfield on Saturday, with Jamie Ritchie ruled out with a minor injury.
articles.title: Russell to captain Scotland against France

articles.description: Thembi Kgatlana scores a stoppage-time winner against Italy as South Africa book their place in the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: South Africa into last 16 with first World Cup win

articles.description: Follow all the latest transfer news and speculation, plus build-up to Wednesday's pre-season matches, including Liverpool v Bayern Munich in Singapore.
articles.title: Transfer latest & pre-season build-up

articles.description: Watch the scenes as Jamaica celebrate progressing through to the last 16 of the Women's World Cup for the first time ever after holding Brazil to a 0-0 draw.
articles.title: 'Tears of joy' as Jamaica through to last 16

articles.description: Watch highlights as South Africa earn a thrilling 3-2 win over Italy, their first ever at the Women's World Cup, to progress through to the last 16.
articles.title: South Africa through to last 16 after thrilling Italy win

articles.description: Fernando Alonso tells BBC Sport's Andrew Benson about being on 'the dark side', feeling misunderstood and being competitive.
articles.title: 'F1 is a great show; you need to play a character'

articles.description: Jac Morgan will captain Wales against England as Leigh Halfpenny wins his 100th cap for his country.
articles.title: Morgan captains Wales as Halfpenny reaches 100 caps

articles.description: Italy's Benedetta Orsi has an "absolute shocker" as she scores an own goal to level the scores against South Africa at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: 'Absolute shocker!' Italy's Orsi scores own goal
